author: buffalonews
title: Area golf
text:

WNYPGA

1.(tie) Tim Fries (Transit Valley) 71
and Kirk Stauffer (Pine Acres) 71

Team Best 2 of 5

2. Denny Ferstler/Thomas Bzdick (Locust Hill)/Dan Tessoni (Locust Hill)/Thomas Mannella (Locust Hill) 126.
3. Kirk Stauffer (Pine Acres)/Lloyd Bean (Locust Hill)/Jim Groark (Locust Hill)/Nick Bhatia (Locust Hill) 127.
DANDE FARMS: 27th Chap ‘N’ Chick — Champs: Karl Gaston/Luther Townsend 64, C0-Runner-Ups: Tom Conners/Ed Ruchala 67, Bill Doherty/Dennis Gonzales 67.
ELKDALE: Mayors Cup — Winners: Eric Niparts/Tom Buffamante 119, Runners-up: Jay Weishan/Jeff Criely 121.
SOUTH PARK: Turkey Shoot — Overall: Ken Gawel 30.5, First Flight: Mark Sullivan 31, Secondf Flight: Dan Mendez 32.5, Third Flight: Sean Mcnamara 33.5, Fourth Flight: Paul Schein 33.5, Fifth Flight: Darren Koepnick 34.5, Sixth Flight: Mike Russell 34.5, Seventh Flight: Dan Fitzgibbons 35, Eighth Flight: Charlie Poloncarz 35.
